page.description: Synchronize the files in two folders.
page.syntax: Difference_List as P = a5_synchronize_folders(C folder1 ,C folder2 [,C pattern [,L synchronize_files ]])

argument.name: Difference_List
argument.description: A dot variable containing lists of the files and folders that have different creation times. List entries are in the format: newer_file|older_file.

argument.name: folder1
argument.description: A folder containing files and sub-folders.

argument.name: folder2
argument.description: A folder containing files and sub-folders.

argument.name: pattern
argument.description: The pattern used to select files. Wildcards are supported.

argument.name: synchronize_files
argument.description:
Optional. Default = .F. Whether to synchronize the files and folders.
.T. = Copy files and folders.
.F. = Do not copy files and folders.

page.discussion: The A5_SYNCHRONIZE_FOLDERS() function returns a dot variable containing lists of the files and folders in Folder1 and Folder2 that have different update times.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example retrieves a dot variable containing lists of the files and folders in the two folders ( c:\ed1 and c:\ed2 ) whose update times are different. It then copies the newer files and folders to the corresponding folder
